org.apache.giraph.partition

类 PartitionStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.PartitionStore<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    直接已知子类:
    DiskBackedPartitionStore, SimplePartitionStore

    public abstract class PartitionStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
    Structure that stores partitions for a worker.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PartitionStore() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void addPartition(Partition<I,V,E,M> partition)
      Add a new partition to the store or just the vertices from the partition to the old partition.
      abstract void deletePartition(Integer partitionId)
      Just delete a partition (more efficient than removePartition(Integer partitionID) if the partition is out of core).
      abstract int getNumPartitions()
      Return the number of stored partitions.
      abstract Partition<I,V,E,M> getPartition(Integer partitionId)
      Get a partition.
      abstract Iterable<Integer> getPartitionIds()
      Return the ids of all the stored partitions as an Iterable.
      abstract boolean hasPartition(Integer partitionId)
      Whether a specific partition is present in the store.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Whether the partition store is empty.
      abstract void putPartition(Partition<I,V,E,M> partition)
      Put a partition back to the store.
      abstract Partition<I,V,E,M> removePartition(Integer partitionId)
      Remove a partition and return it.
      void shutdown()
      Called at the end of the computation.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PartitionStore

        public PartitionStore()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPartition

        public abstract void addPartition(Partition<I,V,E,M> partition)
        Add a new partition to the store or just the vertices from the partition to the old partition.
        参数:
        partition - Partition to add

      • getPartition

        public abstract Partition<I,V,E,M> getPartition(Integer partitionId)
        Get a partition. Note: user has to put back it to the store through #putPartition(Integer, Partition) after use.
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition id
        返回:
        The requested partition

      • putPartition

        public abstract void putPartition(Partition<I,V,E,M> partition)
        Put a partition back to the store. Use this method to be put a partition back after it has been retrieved through getPartition(Integer).
        参数:
        partition - Partition

      • removePartition

        public abstract Partition<I,V,E,M> removePartition(Integer partitionId)
        Remove a partition and return it.
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition id
        返回:
        The removed partition

      • deletePartition

        public abstract void deletePartition(Integer partitionId)
        Just delete a partition (more efficient than removePartition(Integer partitionID) if the partition is out of core).
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition id

      • hasPartition

        public abstract boolean hasPartition(Integer partitionId)
        Whether a specific partition is present in the store.
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition id
        返回:
        True iff the partition is present

      • getPartitionIds

        public abstract Iterable<Integer> getPartitionIds()
        Return the ids of all the stored partitions as an Iterable.
        返回:
        The partition ids

      • getNumPartitions

        public abstract int getNumPartitions()
        Return the number of stored partitions.
        返回:
        The number of partitions

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Whether the partition store is empty.
        返回:
        True iff there are no partitions in the store

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Called at the end of the computation.
